sources.name: UTVariables
sources.script:
source(output(
		VariableSpecificUUID as string,
		VariableSpecificCV as string,
		VariableCV as string,
		AggregationStatisticCV as string,
		AggregationInterval as string,
		AggregationIntervalUnitCV as string,
		ReportYearStartMonth as string,
		ReportYearTypeCV as string,
		AmountUnitCV as string,
		MaximumAmountUnitCV as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTVariables

sinks.name: NormalizedVariables
sinks.script:
UTVariables sink(input(
		VariableSpecificUUID as string,
		VariableSpecificCV as string,
		VariableCV as string,
		AggregationStatisticCV as string,
		AggregationInterval as string,
		AggregationIntervalUnitCV as string,
		ReportYearStartMonth as string,
		ReportYearTypeCV as string,
		AmountUnitCV as string,
		MaximumAmountUnitCV as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	partitionFileNames:['variables.csv']) ~> NormalizedVariables
